summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Requiro Scientia LLC for the period of August 1, 2016, to August 31, 2016. It details the account balance, transactions, and service charges incurred during the month.

persons.name: Philip Fintchre
persons.context: Philip Fintchre is identified as the relationship manager for the account holder, providing support for business banking.

keyFacts: The account number is 7971740761, associated with Requiro Scientia LLC.
The beginning balance for the account on August 1, 2016, was $355.00.
A service charge of $3.00 was withdrawn on August 10, 2016.
The ending balance for the account on August 31, 2016, was $352.00.
The document indicates that the standard monthly service charge was waived due to meeting balance criteria.
